name: pnp-list-formatting-generic-bubble-chart
title: Bubble Chart Column Formatting
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use SharePoint Column Formatting to generate a dynamic bubble chart for list items.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a dynamic bubble chart using SharePoint Column Formatting JSON. It displays words from multiple label columns with varying font sizes, colors, and bold styling based on word length and specific highlights.

references.name: Use column formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use column formatting to customize how fields in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. This sample shows a bubble chart implementation using JSON formatting for multiple label columns with dynamic styles.
